mapper.select:
SELECT a.ID,b.CODENAME,a.TITLE,a.PDFFILE,a.CREATEDAT FROM CSPDF a JOIN CODEDETAIL b ON a.GROUPCODE = b.GROUPCODE AND a.ARCHIVECATEGORY = b.code
AND title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.ID DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CSPDF a JOIN CODEDETAIL b ON a.GROUPCODE = b.GROUPCODE AND a.ARCHIVECATEGORY = b.code
AND title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CSPDF (GROUPCODE, ARCHIVECATEGORY, TITLE, PDFFILE,CREATEDAT) VALUES (#{groupCode}, #{archiveCategory}, #{title}, #{file}, SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul')
